item.title: On the Identifiability of Poisson Branching Structural Causal Model Using Probability Generating Function
item.description: Researchers developed a novel, efficient causal discovery method using Probability Generating Functions to identify causal structures within Poisson Branching Structural Causal Models, overcoming limi…
